constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 127 (Tuesday, July 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SABLAN:
H.R. 4582.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H3755]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

sponsors.fullName: Del. Sablan, Gregorio Kilili Camacho [D-MP-At Large]

title: To amend the definition of State in title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, and for other purposes.
